thread.title: Faux IKEA ad offers President Trump an affordable ‘Börder Wåll’
thread.title_full: Faux IKEA ad offers President Trump an affordable ‘Börder Wåll’

author: Rachel Kaser
title: Faux IKEA ad offers President Trump an affordable ‘Börder Wåll’
text:
FIND OUT WHY 
We have the German “honest news” site Der Postillon to thank for the ad. In it, we see a graphic of just what you would get in every package, along with an individual in a dashing sombrero looking up at the wall in awe. 
Inside the (presumably enormous) box would be: • 471,612 wall panels • 313,329 feet (yards?) of barbed wire • 1,886,448 short screws • 3,772,896 long screws • 1 two-sided hex key (which sounds troublingly easy to misplace) 
If that sounds a little too intimidating, then don’t worry! The Börder Wåll would come with a 5-year guarantee and a 12,000-page instruction manual. 
Der Postillon says it’s available at any IKEA branch, although presumably the President will want one heck of a roof rack to transport it. 
It’s a pity this incredible deal isn’t actually legitimate! We would all enjoy seeing the President patriotically twisting the hex key into the first screw, presumably while Vice President Pence holds the panel aloft!
